TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ShowProcessesHandler(object o, ShowProcessesArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed ShowProcessesHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the ShowProcessesHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the ShowProcessesHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the ShowProcessesHandler is removed from the event.
